Package example.mysports.web.jsf

Class Summary
BaseManagedBean Common managed bean to provide access required across the application.
BaseTeamBean Base managed bean for Team operations.
CreateDivision Managed JSF bean used to create a new Division
CreateTeam JSF managed bean used to create a new Team.
EditDivision  
EditTeam  
ExtensibleEntity<T> Extensible type wrapper used in JSF pages to allow access to the extended attributes through standard JSP EL.
LeagueRepositoryBean JSF session scoped managed bean which looks after access to the stateful LeagueRepository EJB.
LeaguesList Return list of available Leagues from JAX-RS call to MySports Admin app.
LookAndFeel JSF managed bean used to provide custom the look and feel of the UI in a league specific manner
ViewDivision JSF managed bean to view a division with its teams.
ViewLeague JSF managed bean used to view a league's divisions.
ViewTeam JSF managed bean displaying a team.
